title: Quinn bug
body: playing as quinn, tahm kench at me while i was in my bird ult.  I stayed a bird throughout the rest of the game even through death.  cd stayed locked at 111s.

replies.body:
Hey Frozenstein,

Thanks for the report! We're aware of this issue and are working on a fix. ^-^
Just though I would add that this happened to an opposing Quinn in a game I just had, interesting thing is that the passive animation still happens.
